attributes.action: Free home to school travel for all rural children/ improve bus services
attributes.background: Privatized school bus service across Essex, Enormous bus fare price hikes, rural services cancelled, disrupted and running late. Roads around schools congested and polluted and children are at extra risk caused by the extra cars, No help for low income families over 6 miles from school

rejection.details:
Fares for school children are the responsibility of local bus companies, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking Government to fund school travel for school children in rural areas.
